name: QuizCo BETA
description:
QuizCo BETA is here. For WebGl, just simply play in your browser. 

For Windows: READ CAREFULLY!

1: Download the file

2: Extract the file

3: Open the file, then right click on the file with the QuizCo logo. 

4: After you right click, click show more options, then click create shortcut.

5: Next, you drag the shortcut file you created and drag it to the where you have your apps. 

6: Finally, click on the shortcut and enjoy!
